name: Attic
longDesc:
You are in the attic.
There is an exit in the floor that drops down into the UPSTAIRS HALLWAY.
On the opposite wall, a chimney for the fireplace in the living room
goes up through the roof.
description:

chest of drawers.name: chest of drawers
chest of drawers.description: The chest of drawers is old, antique, matched mirror

rug.name: rug
rug.description: The rug is old and unraveling.
rug.discoveryStatement: There is a thread you can pull. That might come in handy.

thread.name: thread
thread.description: A long, loose thread from unraveling rug

mirror.name: mirror
mirror.description: The mirror is old, gilded, and cracked, with scorch marks running across it.

notebook.name: notebook
notebook.description: The well-worn notebook is stuffed with extra pieces of paper.
notebook.discoveryStatement: A green piece of paper has slid almost all the way out of the notebook.

paper.name: paper
paper.description:
The top of the paper says 'TO DO - FIX DE-SHRINK FUNCTION ON SHRINK RAY!!!'.
Underneath that is a list of random things:
     shampoo, two old socks, crushed aluminum can, stuffing from couch,
     dirt from yard, screw from back of refrigerator, corn flakes,
     copper wire from the back of TV, candle wax,
     'de-shrink' software from the computer in basement lab

exitBlock: it is too far from the attic door in the hallway ceiling to the hallway floor
